Endpoints

  • /docs
  • /codeNames
  • /convert

/codeNames

method : get
output : list < { code : “LKR”, name : “Sri Lanka” } >

Example

response > 
[
    {
	    "code":  "FJD",
	    "name":  "Fiji Dollar"
    },
    {
	    "code":  "MXN",
	    "name":  "Mexican Peso"
    },
    {
	    "code":  "SCR",
	    "name":  "Seychelles rupee"
    },
]

/convert

method : post
input :

amount : “Double”, sourceCurrency : “String”, targetCurrency : “String”

output :

“Double”

Example

   body > {    
   "amount"  :  1000,
   "sourceCurrency"  :  "LKR",
   "targetCurrency"  :  "USD"
    }
    
    response > 2.7352
